pr_title: [RW-2820][risk=no] Add error messaging for Concept Search

timeline.message: RW-2820 show error message in table if search concepts call fails
RW-2820 show error icon, hide counts if domainCounts call fails
RW-2820 add errors for domainInfo and surveyInfo calls to state
RW-2820 add error messaging for domainInfo and surveyInfo calls
RW-2820 clean up loading state and display

timeline.bodyText: Should we make an generic error component that is reusable across all react components for error messaging?
timeline.author: freemabd

replies.bodyText: +1 to this – this PR caught my eye, as I was running into some scenarios elsewhere in the Workbench UI where we don't have a clear / consistent way of displaying errors. A core component here would be great.
replies.author: gjuggler

replies.bodyText: Agreed, we're already using this same template in cohort builder, cohort review and now concept search (maybe other places as well?).  I've filed a ticket for this and can follow-up on it.
replies.author: dolbeew
